text: Cover to Cover is an American television program broadcast on the business channel CNBC in 2005. It deals especially with criminology and trial cases. The anchor is Liz Claman. The program is produced by NBC News Productions and the Dateline NBC reporters. ==Episode subjects== *Brown's Chicken Massacre *Robert Pickton *Elián González *Anna Slabaugh *Birdie Joe Hoaks *Robin Gilbert *Chain of Command: The Road from 9/11 to Abu Ghraib (Seymour Hersh) Category:CNBC original programming
title: Cover to Cover (2005 TV program)
